data.actual_result: You get scrolled down too far making the next server's icon partly visible
data.expected_result: You should only get scrolled the amount needed to make that server's icon completely visible like before
data.short_description: Clicking on a server icon partly out of view at the top/bottom of your server list scrolls too far when correctly its position
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in enough servers to be able to scroll down your server list - Position a server you're not currently in so that its icon isn't fully visible at the top or bottom of your server list - Click on it and observe
